attributes.background:
I and many others like me want parental alienation to become a crime! I am a father fighting to see his unborn baby before he's even born! Also I was a child without a father so I feel deeply about this subject! please help us In are fight
To stop children's love being lost!!

rejection.details:
It sounds like you're having a difficult time, but we can't accept petitions where there's already a very similar one on the site. You might want to sign and share this instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/249833
